kolambaa jathyanthara pasale aadi shishyayaku wu rajiw naganadan saha ohuge mithuran athurudahanwa aththe 2008 wasare sapthambar masa 17 wenida sitaya. 2008 agosthu 08 wenida sita sapthambar masa 17 wenida athara kalaya thula kotahena, wallawaththa, thrikunamalaya, madakalapuwa athulu sthana kihipayakadi tharunayan ekolos deneku paharagena gos athurudan kirima sambandhayen aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa wisin pawathwana lada parikshanawalin anathuruwa, nawika hamuda niladharin athulu chudithayin pirisakata erehiwa nadu pawara thibe. 2008 saha 2009 awadhiye tharunayan ekolos deneku kappam labaganima sandaha paharagena giya bawa pawasena siduwimata adalawa hitapu nawika hamudapathi wasantha karannagoda chodana labana athara, siya palana samaye awasana dinawaladi hitapu janadhipathi maithripala sirisena wisin ohu nawika hamudawe ihalama dhuraya wana ‚Äòadmiral of da flit‚Äô sammanayen pudanu labuni.
